snippet.title: Enshrouded - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Learn about the ruined, dangerous world of Enshrouded in this announcement trailer for the upcoming survival action RPG for 1 to 16 players. The trailer showcases weapons you can use, like swords, bows, and more, as well as formidable enemies, building elements, and more. 

Enshrouded is set in a decaying world of magic and beauty, ruined by a pestilence unleashed from the depths of the earth. Roaming and ravaging the land are the mutated remnants of its fallen people — driven to madness and controlled by the fog. But above the mists and hidden deep in ancient temples, warriors from a forgotten age sleep, dreamless and impervious to time.

Enshrouded will be available in Early Access on PC in 2023.

#IGN #Gaming
